text: The U.S. Senate Environment and Public Works Subcommittee on Green Jobs and the New Economy was a subcommittee of the U.S. Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works. ==Members, 114th Congress== Majority Minority * Dan Sullivan, Alaska Chairman * Roger Wicker, Mississippi * Jeff Sessions, Alabama * Jeff Merkley, Oregon, Ranking Member * Tom Carper, Delaware * Bernie Sanders, VermontBernie Sanders is an Independent, but caucuses with Democrats on the committee. Ex officio Ex officio * Jim Inhofe, Oklahoma * Barbara Boxer, California ==References== Environment and Public Works Green Jobs and the New Economy
title:
United States Senate Environment and Public Works Subcommittee on Green Jobs
and the New Economy
